thewani sthanaya kolambaa bauddha kantha widuhal 'ee' pilata himiwiya.balaka kandayam 22k saha balika kandayam 12ka sahabhagithwayen kusalana, palanga saha banduna washayen kotas thunakin pawathi me tharagawaliye thyaga pradanothsawayata pasal handbol sangamaye sabhapathi di.es.senanayaka widuhalpathi di.em.di.disanayaka, upa sabhapathi karnal raja gunasekara, lekam kapila pradip mahathwaru samaga tharagawaliyata anugrahakathwaya labadun niyo homs paudgalika samagame samanyadhikari nil surawira mahatha sahabhagi wiya.tharaga prathipala meseyabalaka - kusalana shurathawa – di.es.senanayaka widuhala, anushurathawa – wels kumara widuhala, thewani sthanaya – wasala kotte santha anthoni widuhalapalanga shurathawa – nalanda widuhal 'bi' pila, anushurathawa - wels kumara widuhal 'bi' pila, thewani sthanaya - isipathana widuhal 'ee' pilabanduna shurathawa - nalanda widuhal 'ee'pila, anushurathawa – galkissa widya widyalaya, thewani sthanaya – panadura rajakiya widuhalabalika - kusalana shurathawa - galewela madabadda widuhala, anushurathawa - wasalakotte santha anthoni widuhala, thewani sthanaya - kolambaa bauddha kantha widuhal 'ee' pilapalanga shurathawa – kolambaa bauddha kantha widuhal 'bi' pila, anushurathawa – kolambaa dewi balika widuhal 'bi' pila, thewani sthanaya – galkissa usas balika widuhalabanduna shurathawa – yahapath enderage kanyarama 'bi' pila, anushurathawa - kolambaa dewi balika widuhal 'ee' pila, thewani sthanaya - gothami balika widuhala.
